name: Memory Zone Meme "Heartbreaker"
description:
An entity imbued with specific cognition, formed by the accumulation of subconscious fragments in the Memory Zone.
Life is parceled in impenetrable barriers, obstructing the intrusion of the alien. But beneath that ironclad shell, there is a region both nameless and fragile.

skills.name: Structural Deviation
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Aegis of the Unyielding
skills.description: Enters the Safeguard state. When not Weakness Broken, reduces DMG received. Once Weakness is Broken, action will be delayed. After Weakness is Broken, increases DMG received.
